accuracy.description: The degree to which the final answer provided matches the correct answer to the question.

completeness.description: The extent to which the solution addresses all aspects of the question.

reliability.description: The consistency of the multi-agent system in providing correct and complete answers over multiple instances of the task.

efficiency.description: The amount of time and resources required to arrive at the final answer.

reasoning_traceability.description: The ability to follow the logical steps the agent took to arrive at its conclusion.

handling_ambiguity.description: The system's ability to deal with ambiguous or incomplete information and still provide a relevant response.

data_sourcing.description: The ability to source data from reliable and appropriate places, avoiding data contamination.
